1: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> מִזְמ֥וֹר <sup>4210 </sup> <n>A Psalm</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> אַ֭שְׁרֵי <sup>835 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> מַשְׂכִּ֣יל <sup>7919 </sup> <n>[is] he that considereth</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> דָּ֑ל <sup>1800 </sup> <n>the poor</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>him in time</n> רָ֝עָ֗ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>of trouble</n> יְֽמַלְּטֵ֥הוּ <sup>4422 </sup> <n>will deliver</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
2: יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> יִשְׁמְרֵ֣הוּ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>will preserve</n> וִֽ֭יחַיֵּהוּ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>him and keep him alive</n> [יֶאְשֹּׁר כ] (וְאֻשַּׁ֣ר <sup>833 </sup> <n>call</n> ק) בָּאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n> וְאַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּ֝תְּנֵ֗הוּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and thou wilt not deliver</n> בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>him unto the will</n> אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>of his enemies</n>
3: יְֽהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> יִ֭סְעָדֶנּוּ <sup>5582 </sup> <n>will strengthen</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> עֶ֣רֶשׂ <sup>6210 </sup> <n>him upon the bed</n> דְּוָ֑י <sup>1741 </sup> <n>of languishing</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מִ֝שְׁכָּב֗וֹ <sup>4904 </sup> <n>all his bed</n> הָפַ֥כְתָּ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>thou wilt make</n> בְחָלְיֽוֹ׃ <sup>2483 </sup> <n>in his sickness</n>
4: אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אָ֭מַרְתִּי <sup>559 </sup> <n>I said</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>LORD</n> חָנֵּ֑נִי <sup>2603 </sup> <n>be merciful</n> רְפָאָ֥ה <sup>7495 </sup> <n>unto me heal</n> נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> חָטָ֥אתִי <sup>2398 </sup> <n>for I have sinned</n> לָֽךְ׃
5: אוֹיְבַ֗י <sup>341 </sup> <n>Mine enemies</n> יֹאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>speak</n> רַ֣ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> לִ֑י מָתַ֥י <sup>4970 </sup> <n>When</n> יָ֝מ֗וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of me When shall he die</n> וְאָבַ֥ד <sup>6 </sup> <n>perish</n> שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>and his name</n>
6: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>and when</n> בָּ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>And if he come</n> לִרְא֨וֹת ׀ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>to see</n> שָׁ֤וְא <sup>7723 </sup> <n>vanity</n> יְדַבֵּ֗ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>[me] he speaketh</n> לִבּ֗וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>his heart</n> יִקְבָּץ־ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>gathereth</n> אָ֥וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> ל֑וֹ יֵצֵ֖א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>to itself [when] he goeth</n> לַח֣וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>abroad</n> יְדַבֵּֽר׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>he telleth</n>
7: יַ֗חַד <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> יִ֭תְלַחֲשׁוּ <sup>3907 </sup> <n>me whisper</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> שֹׂנְאָ֑י <sup>8130 </sup> <n>All that hate</n> עָלַ֓י ׀ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Against</n> יַחְשְׁב֖וּ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>against me against me do they devise</n> רָעָ֣ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>my hurt</n> לִֽי׃
8: דְּֽבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>disease</n> בְּ֭לִיַּעַל <sup>1100 </sup> <n>An evil</n> יָצ֣וּק <sup>3332 </sup> <n>[say they] cleaveth fast</n> בּ֑וֹ וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>when</n> שָׁ֝כַ֗ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>unto him and [now] that he lieth</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יוֹסִ֥יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>no more</n> לָקֽוּם׃ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>he shall rise up</n>
9: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Even</n> אִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>friend</n> שְׁלוֹמִ֨י ׀ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>Yea mine own familiar</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> בָּטַ֣חְתִּי <sup>982 </sup> <n>in whom I trusted</n> ב֭וֹ אוֹכֵ֣ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>which did eat</n> לַחְמִ֑י <sup>3899 </sup> <n>of my bread</n> הִגְדִּ֖יל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>hath lifted up</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> עָקֵֽב׃ <sup>6119 </sup> <n>[his] heel</n>
10: וְאַתָּ֤ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> חָנֵּ֥נִי <sup>2603 </sup> <n>be merciful</n> וַהֲקִימֵ֑נִי <sup>6965 </sup> <n>unto me and raise me up</n> וַֽאֲשַׁלְּמָ֥ה <sup>7999 </sup> <n>that I may requite</n> לָהֶֽם׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n>
11: בְּזֹ֣את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>I</n> יָ֭דַעְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>By this I know</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> חָפַ֣צְתָּ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>that thou favourest</n> בִּ֑י כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָרִ֖יעַ <sup>7321 </sup> <n>doth not triumph</n> אֹיְבִ֣י <sup>341 </sup> <n>me because mine enemy</n> עָלָֽי׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n>
12: וַאֲנִ֗י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> בְּ֭תֻמִּי <sup>8537 </sup> <n>me in mine integrity</n> תָּמַ֣כְתָּ <sup>8551 </sup> <n>And as for me thou upholdest</n> בִּ֑י וַתַּצִּיבֵ֖נִי <sup>5324 </sup> <n>and settest</n> לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>me before thy face</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
13: בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[be] the LORD</n> אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> מֵֽ֭הָעוֹלָם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>from everlasting</n> וְעַ֥ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> הָעוֹלָ֗ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>and to everlasting</n> אָ֘מֵ֥ן ׀ <sup>543 </sup> <n>Amen</n> וְאָמֵֽן׃ <sup>543 </sup> <n>and Amen</n>
